name: Dr.Kumaresan M
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.

in_brief:
Dr. M. Kumaresan has more than 13 years of teaching experience. His Research  interests Federated Multi-task Learning and Machine Learning.
He has passed SLET (State Level Eligibility Test for Lecturers.)
research_areas: Applied Mathematics for Computer Science e

publications.title: Analysis of mobility based COVID-19 epidemic model using Federated Multitask Learning
